description: The simplest implementation of OData client.
releaseNotes:
+v1.7.0
  - [Breaking Change] Override body null when 204(No Content).
+v1.6.11
  - Add feature switch: notfound is success/error flag on request level.
+v1.6.10
  - Add feature switch: notfound is success/error flag.
+ v1.6.9
  - Change BatchAsync return type from IEnumeable to IReadOnlyList
  - Add cancellalation token param
  - Running unit test on netcoreapp3.1
+ v1.6.8
  - [Bug fix] Fix response headers of batch
+ v1.6.7
  - Add additaionl headers
  - fix parse error as UTF8 with BOM 
+ v1.6.6
  - Add constructor
  - Support any provider has multi format of batch response
+ v1.6.5
  - Add v4 OData parameterizer
+ v1.6.4
  - [Bug fix] Fix deserialize with json path for array
+ v1.6.3
  - [Bug fix] Fix batch request issue on netcoreapp2.1
+ v1.6.2
  - [Bug fix] Enhanced Deserialize with json path for array result
+ v1.6.1
  - Improve dependencies resolving
  - [Bug fix] Fix Deserialize with json path for array result
+ v1.6.0
  - Add SendAsync method for batch request: compatible BatchAsync
  - Change interface of BatchAsync
+ v1.5.3
  - [Bug fix] Fix response for HTTP 404
+ v1.5.2
  - [Bug fix] Fix serialization for illegal JSON Path 
+ v1.5.1
  - [Bug fix] Fix Batch request of GET & HEAD
+ v1.5.0
  - change version of references
+ v1.4.2
  - Beautify TimeSpan ISO8601 duration format
  - Thank you for your contribution: @takepara
+ v1.4.1
  - Remove depndency: System.Xml
+ v1.4.0
  - Support parameterized uri
+ v1.3.0
  - [Breaking Change] Change to clean interface without Newtonsoft.Json interface.
+ v1.2.2
  - Support byte array property
+ v1.2.1
  - Support request addition to batch request instance
+ v1.2.0
  - Support binary type (byte[], Stream) in `ReadAs`
+ v1.1.0
  - Request level json serialize settings
  - Instance level json serialize settings
+ v1.0.0
  - First release
